descriptors.name: btmesh_ncp_empty
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - NCP Empty
descriptors.description: An NCP Target C application that makes it possible for the NCP Host Controller to access the Bluetooth Mesh stack via UART. It provides access to the host layer via BGAPI and not to the link layer via HCI.

properties.value: brd4104a brd4158a brd4159a brd4165b brd4167a brd4168a brd4174a brd4174b brd4175a brd4305a brd4305c brd4305d brd4305e brd4306a brd4306b brd4306c brd4306d com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|NCP Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_ncp_empty_v1_1
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - NCP Empty v1.1
descriptors.description: An NCP Target C application that makes it possible for the NCP Host Controller to access the Bluetooth Mesh stack via UART. It provides access to the host layer via BGAPI and not to the link layer via HCI. Contains models from BT mesh specification 1.1.

properties.value: brd2601b brd2602a brd2703a brd4103a brd4110b brd4111b brd4115a brd4161a brd4162a brd4163a brd4164a brd4166a brd4166c brd4170a brd4172a brd4172b brd4173a brd4176a brd4179b brd4180a brd4180b brd4181a brd4181b brd4181c brd4186c brd4187c brd4188b brd4190a brd4194a brd4195a brd4195b brd4196a brd4196b brd4198a brd4304a brd4308a brd4308b brd4308c brd4308d brd4309a brd4309b brd4316a brd4317a brd4318a brd4329a brd4332a brd4335a com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|NCP Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_ncp_empty
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - NCP Empty
descriptors.description: Demonstrates the bare minimum needed for an NCP Target C application. This example is recommended for EFR32xG22, which has limited RAM and flash, and therefore some of the stack classes are disabled by default.

properties.value: brd4108a brd4182a brd4183a brd4183c brd4184a brd4184b brd4311a brd4311b brd4312a brd4314a brd4402a brd4403a com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|NCP Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_csr_generator
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC CSR Generator (Secure Vault)
descriptors.description: Certificate generating firmware example. Software is generating the device EC key pair, the signing request for the device certificate, and other related data. The generated data can be read out by the Central Authority.

properties.value: brd2601b brd2703a brd4115a brd4181c brd4186c brd4187c brd4188b brd4195a brd4195b brd4196a brd4196b brd4198a brd4308c brd4308d brd4316a brd4317a brd4332a com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_dfu_distributor
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC DFU Distributor
descriptors.description: Demonstrates the Firmware Distributor role based on the BT Mesh Model specification. Distributor is responsible for delivering new firmware images to the Target nodes and monitoring the progress of the firmware update.

properties.value: brd4103a brd4161a brd4162a brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4172b brd4173a brd4176a brd4180a brd4180b brd4181a brd4181b brd4181c brd4186c brd4187c brd4188b brd4190a brd4195a brd4195b brd4196a brd4196b brd4198a brd4304a brd4308a brd4308b brd4308c brd4308d brd4316a brd4317a brd4318a brd4335a
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_dfu_distributor
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC DFU Distributor
descriptors.description: Demonstrates the Firmware Distributor role based on the BT Mesh Model specification. Distributor is responsible for delivering new firmware images to the Target nodes and monitoring the progress of the firmware update.

properties.value: brd2601b brd2703a brd4115a brd4166a brd4166c brd4179b brd4309a brd4309b brd4329a brd4332a
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_empty
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Empty
descriptors.description: Demonstrates the bare minimum needed for a Bluetooth Mesh C application. The application starts Unprovisioned Device Beaconing after booting, and then waits to be provisioned.

properties.value: brd2601b brd2602a brd2703a brd4103a brd4104a brd4108a brd4110b brd4111b brd4115a brd4158a brd4159a brd4161a brd4162a brd4163a brd4164a brd4165b brd4166a brd4166c brd4167a brd4168a brd4170a brd4172a brd4172b brd4173a brd4174a brd4174b brd4175a brd4176a brd4179b brd4180a brd4180b brd4181a brd4181b brd4181c brd4182a brd4183a brd4183c brd4184a brd4184b brd4186c brd4187c brd4188b brd4190a brd4194a brd4195a brd4195b brd4196a brd4196b brd4198a brd4304a brd4305a brd4305c brd4305d brd4305e brd4306a brd4306b brd4306c brd4306d brd4308a brd4308b brd4308c brd4308d brd4309a brd4309b brd4311a brd4311b brd4312a brd4314a brd4316a brd4317a brd4318a brd4329a brd4332a brd4335a brd4402a brd4403a com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_empty_cbp
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Empty with Certificate-Based Provisioning support
descriptors.description: Demonstrates the bare minimum needed for a Bluetooth Mesh C application that allows Certificate-Based Provisioning (CBP). The application starts Unprovisioned Device Beaconing after boot waiting to be provisioned to a Mesh Network.

properties.value: brd2601b brd2703a brd4115a brd4181c brd4186c brd4187c brd4188b brd4195a brd4195b brd4196a brd4196b brd4198a brd4308c brd4308d brd4316a brd4317a brd4332a com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_hsl
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC HSL Light
descriptors.description: An out-of-the-box software demo where the LEDs of the mainboard can be switched on and off, and their lighting intensity, hue, and saturation can be set. The example also tries to establish friendship as a Friend node.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_hsl
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC HSL Light
descriptors.description: An out-of-the-box software demo where the LEDs of the Thunderboard Sense 2 can be switched on and off, and their lighting intensity, hue, and saturation can be set. The example also tries to establish friendship as a Friend node.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_sensor_client
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Sensor Client
descriptors.description: This example demonstrates the Bluetooth Mesh Sensor Client Model. It collects and displays sensor measurement data from remote device(s) (e.g., btmesh_soc_sensor_server).

descriptors.description: This example demonstrates the Bluetooth Mesh Sensor Client Model. It collects and displays sensor measurement data from remote device(s) (e.g., btmesh_soc_sensor_server).

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_sensor_server
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Sensor Server
descriptors.description: This example demonstrates the Bluetooth Mesh Sensor Server Model and Sensor Setup Server Model. It measures temperature, people count, and illuminance, and sends the measurement data to a remote device (e.g., btmesh_soc_sensor_client).

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_switch
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch
descriptors.description: An out-of-the-box Software Demo where the device acts as a switch. Push Button presses or CLI commands can control the state, lightness, and color temperature of the LEDs and scenes on a remote device.

descriptors.name: btmesh_soc_switch_low_power
descriptors.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch Low Power
descriptors.description: An out-of-the-box Software Demo where the device acts as a switch. It is optimized for low current consumption with disabled CLI, logging, and LCD.Push Button presses can control the state, lightness, and color temperature of the LEDs and scenes on a remote device.
